cast.name: 萨莎·库利珂娃 Aleksandra Kulikova
伊凡·乌尔甘特 Ivan Urgant
伊戈尔·切涅维奇 Igor Chernevich
克里斯蒂娜·库兹米娜 Kristina Kuzmina

writer.name: 鲍里斯·赫列勃尼科夫 Boris Khlebnikov

introduction: Kind and lazy Jenya comes to Moscow from small village in Belarus for earnings... Criminal incident unexpectedly separates Jenya from companions and leaves him alone without money and documents. He has no friends or relatives in this big and hostile city and he is about to end as a homeless bum... But suddenly a miracle happens with Jenya: a strange old man brought homeless Jenya to his flat and let him stay. Soon Jenya is invited to join a strange fight the old man is engaged in: a fight against evil, that spoils life in Moscow. Jenya willingly participates in the old man's undertakings, until he meets the old man's daughter who reveals Jenya a horrible truth of her father. Written by KOKTEBEL Film Company
